headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Jack Henry (JKHY) Deepening Fintech Integrations And Financial Crime Defenses
summary: In recent days, Stablecore and Celsior Technologies announced they have joined Jack Henry & Associates’ Fintech Integration Network, while SELCO Community Credit Union adopted Jack Henry’s Financial Crimes Defender platform to strengthen fraud and AML capabilities. By extending its core and digital platforms into digital assets, workflow automation, and financial crime prevention, Jack Henry is deepening its role as critical infrastructure for banks and credit unions seeking compliant...
